assessment.title: Career Assessment
assessment.subtitle: Discover your ideal career path with AI-powered insights
assessment.comprehensiveDesc: This comprehensive assessment combines two scientifically-validated tests to help you understand your career interests and personality traits:
assessment.riasecDesc: Identifies your preferences across six career themes: Realistic, Investigative, Artistic, Social, Enterprising, and Conventional.
assessment.bigFiveDesc: Measures your personality across five dimensions: Openness, Conscientiousness, Extraversion, Agreeableness, and Neuroticism.
assessment.honestAnswers: Answer honestly - there are no right or wrong answers
assessment.tailoredRecommendations: Receive career recommendations tailored to your profile
assessment.question: Question
assessment.essayPrompt: Tell us about your career aspirations and goals
assessment.essayPlaceholder: Write at least 100 characters about your career interests, goals, and what motivates you...
assessment.analyzingResponses: Our AI is analyzing your responses and generating personalized career recommendations...

results.title: Your Assessment Results
